name: Beat 'Em or Get Yeeted
description:
Rage room meets parkour in this surrealist game. Enjoy listening to soothing philosophical audio while destroying objects as a buff cube, or just wait around and see what happens. Embrace the weird, and have fun!

Credits:

  • Development Team: Lydia Dufek, Frankie Gonzalez, Amy Paul, Fiona Thompson, Brian Vu
  • Clippy. Just Clippy.: Lydia Dufek
  • Sound Mixing: Amy Paul
  • UI Design: Fiona Thompson
  • Death, Destroyer and Respawner of Objects: Lydia Dufek and Brian Vu
  • Voice Acting:
    • The Voice From Under Your Bed: Fiona Thompson
    • Clippy, Haunting Your Nightmares Since 2002: Amy Paul
  • Exterminator of Bugs: Frankie Gonzalez
  • Renaissance Man: Brian Vu
  • Your Mom: Frankie Gonzalez
  • Cthulu's First Advisor: Lydia Dufek
  • The One To Blame for The Cursed Sh*t: Amy Paul
  • Stolen Traffic Cone: Brian Vu
  • Handful of Tree Pollen: Fiona Thompson
